alert.note: Alert for Jewell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 8:02PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jewell, southern Nuckolls and southeastern Webster Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 801 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Guide Rock, or 36 miles south of Hastings, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bostwick around 815 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Superior, Webber and Hardy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
